name: Janitor Simulator
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a virtual janitor? Finally, you can... All for the cost of 0 currency units, you too can be a diligent virtual janitor!

WASD = Move.

Mouse = Look Around.

1-7 = Change Background Track.

Just keep in mind, do not slack off, or you'll be discontinued! Listen for the sound when your ragie wagie boss is near, you don't want him to be angry or disappointed with your work!!!
